original: @73a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @73a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamāri-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /🔽gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du / gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Means of Attaining Black Yamāri, called The Means of Attaining Black Yamāri

original: mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Lord Black Yamāri.

original: bla ma la gus de rjes la //
analyzed: bla ma la gus de rjes la //
translated: After that, devoted to the guru,

original: gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje ni //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra of Black Yamāri

original: rang 'od yan lag 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: rang 'od yan lag 'dus pa yi //
translated: Is the expansion of bliss from the gathering of one's own light.

original: bde ba rgyas la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: bde ba rgyas la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: Homage to the one who expands bliss,

original: gshin rje gshed nag sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: The means of attaining Black Yamāri

original: de nyid blo yis bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nyid blo yis bshad par bya //
translated: Is explained by the mind itself.

original: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
translated: Sitting on a comfortable seat,

original: snying rjes skad cig lhar bskyed la //
analyzed: snying rjes skad cig lhar bskyed la //
translated: With compassion, instantly generate the deity,

original: snying gar padma ya yig dgod //
analyzed: snying gar padma ya yig dgod //
translated: Place the syllable ya in the heart,

original: 'od 'phros sbyangs te bla ma dgug //
analyzed: 'od 'phros sbyangs te bla ma dgug //
translated: Emit light, purify, and invite the guru.

original: bkod pa bsams la phyag dang ni //
analyzed: bkod pa bsams la phyag dang ni //
translated: Imagine the array, make prostrations,

original: mchod pa la sogs tshogs bsags te //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs tshogs bsags te //
translated: Offerings, and so forth, accumulate merit,

original: blo yis mkha' la gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: blo yis mkha' la gshegs su gsol //
translated: And mentally request departure.

original: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
analyzed: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
translated: Then, meditate on the four brahmavihāras.

original: rang bzhin rnams dang bral bas rgyu //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams dang bral bas rgyu //
translated: The cause is being free from intrinsic nature.

original: 'di ltar yang na mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang na mtshan ma ni //
translated: In this way, or else, the sign

original: rnam par dpyad pa med pas na //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa med pas na //
translated: is not analyzed.

original: 'di ltar smon @73b lam rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'di ltar smon @73b lam rnam par spangs //
translated: In this way, the aspiration is abandoned.

original: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

original: de ltar brtan par bsams nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar brtan par bsams nas ni //
translated: Having thus stabilized the visualization,

original: ma yig las byung nyi ma las //
analyzed: ma yig las byung nyi ma las //
translated: from the syllable maṃ arises the sun,

original: sna tshogs h'um las rgya gram bsam //
analyzed: sna tshogs h'um las rgya gram bsam //
translated: and from the variegated hūṃ, the crossed vajra.

original: h'um las 'od 'phros ra ba'o //🔽de dkyil pam las padma ni //
analyzed: h'um las 'od 'phros ra ba'o // de dkyil pam las padma ni //
translated: Light radiates from the hūṃ and creates the boundary.🔽In the center of that, from paṃ arises a red lotus,

original: dmar po'i steng du zla ba ste //
analyzed: dmar po'i steng du zla ba ste //
translated: upon which is a moon,

original: de las dbyangs yig rnam par bsam //
analyzed: de las dbyangs yig rnam par bsam //
translated: and upon that, the vowels are visualized.

original: de steng ram las nyi ma ste //
analyzed: de steng ram las nyi ma ste //
translated: Upon that, from raṃ arises a sun,

original: gsal byed bkod la gsal bar byas //
analyzed: gsal byed bkod la gsal bar byas //
translated: and the consonants are arranged and clarified.

original: de las gong bu h'um du gyur //
analyzed: de las gong bu h'um du gyur //
translated: From that, a sphere arises, which becomes hūṃ.

original: de las rdo rje h'um ldan bsam //
analyzed: de las rdo rje h'um ldan bsam //
translated: From that, visualize a vajra with hūṃ.

original: de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
translated: From that, Vajrasattva

original: zhal gzhan gshin rje gshed dang 'dra //
analyzed: zhal gzhan gshin rje gshed dang 'dra //
translated: has another face like Yamāntaka.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar bar bsgom //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar bar bsgom //
translated: Meditate that the main face is white.

original: thugs kar sa bon gsal ba las ;
analyzed: thugs kar sa bon gsal ba las ;
translated: At the heart, the seed syllable is clear,

original: /'od 'phros bkug la zhal zhugs pas //
analyzed: /'od 'phros bkug la zhal zhugs pas //
translated: and light radiates, summoning the deity, who enters the mouth.

original: snying gar zhu nas thim byas la //🔽mkha' gsang sbyangs la gtor ma bsam //🔽zhu bas skar mda' lam zhugs bzhin //
analyzed: snying gar zhu nas thim byas la // mkha' gsang sbyangs la gtor ma bsam // zhu bas skar mda' lam zhugs bzhin //
translated: It melts into the heart and dissolves.🔽Purify the space and the secret place and imagine the bali.🔽The melting is like a shooting star entering

original: mkha' gsang nang du babs gyur pas //
analyzed: mkha' gsang nang du babs gyur pas //
translated: the space and secret place.

original: bdag nyid yum dang bcas pa zhu //
analyzed: bdag nyid yum dang bcas pa zhu //
translated: The self and the mother dissolve.

original: de las thig le bzhi 'phros pas//
analyzed: de las thig le bzhi 'phros pas//
translated: From that four bindus emanate

original: lha mo bzhi yis bskul bar bsam //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi yis bskul bar bsam //
translated: and the four goddesses urge.

original: rje btsun stong nyid la bzhengs la //
analyzed: rje btsun stong nyid la bzhengs la //
translated: “Arise, O venerable one, from emptiness,

original: khams gsum kun gyi gti mug sel //
analyzed: khams gsum kun gyi gti mug sel //
translated: and clear away the ignorance of the three realms.

original: rje btsun chos nyid la bzhengs la //
analyzed: rje btsun chos nyid la bzhengs la //
translated: Arise, O venerable one, from reality,🔽and act for the benefit of sentient beings with compassion.”

original: snying rje sems can don mdzod cig / de rjes de yang thim gyur pas //
analyzed: snying rje sems can don mdzod cig / de rjes de yang thim gyur pas //
translated: After that, that also dissolves.

original: thig le'i ngo bor blta byas la //
analyzed: thig le'i ngo bor blta byas la //
translated: The essence of the bindu is seen.

original: zhu bas yongs su gyur pa skyes//
analyzed: zhu bas yongs su gyur pa skyes//
translated: The complete transformation is born from the melting.

original: ya yig sngon po nyi dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: ya yig sngon po nyi dkyil 'khor //
translated: The syllable ya is a blue sun maṇḍala.

original: de las rdo rje sa bon bcas //
analyzed: de las rdo rje sa bon bcas //
translated: From that arises a vajra with a seed syllable.

original: 'od 'phros bstims te gyur pa las //
analyzed: 'od 'phros bstims te gyur pa las //
translated: Light shines and draws in and transforms.

original: bdag nyid 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed //
translated: One is born as Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la //
translated: The principal face is blue,

original: g-yas dkar g-yon pa dmar ba ste //
analyzed: g-yas dkar g-yon pa dmar ba ste //
translated: the right face is white, the left face is red,🔽and the upper face is black.

original: rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i lus //
analyzed: rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i lus //
translated: The body endowed with his mother🔽Has a vajra, sword, wheel,🔽Lotus, flaying knife, and skull-cup in his hands,

original: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag / ma he gdan bcas gsus po che //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag / ma he gdan bcas gsus po che //
translated: And is pot-bellied, with a buffalo seat.

original: glang po stag gi pags pa mnabs //
analyzed: glang po stag gi pags pa mnabs //
translated: He wears elephant and tiger skins.

original: mche gtsigs sprul gyi chas ldan bskyed //
analyzed: mche gtsigs sprul gyi chas ldan bskyed //
translated: He is generated with bared fangs and a snake wrap.🔽The conscious one radiates light and attracts the awareness being.

original: sems ldan 'od 'phros ye shes dgug / dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: sems ldan 'od 'phros ye shes dgug / dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Jham hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: de nas mig dang rna ba sna //
analyzed: de nas mig dang rna ba sna //
translated: Then, in the eyes, ears, nose,

original: lce dang lus yid rnams la yang //
analyzed: lce dang lus yid rnams la yang //
translated: Tongue, body, and mind,

original: mngon shes bsgrub phyir lha bsgom bya //
analyzed: mngon shes bsgrub phyir lha bsgom bya //
translated: One should meditate on the deity in order to accomplish the superknowledges.

original: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
analyzed: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
translated: Kṣiṃ jriṃ kṣaṃ gaṃ kaṃ saṃ.

original: de nas sku gsung thugs gsum la //
analyzed: de nas sku gsung thugs gsum la //
translated: Then, in the body, speech, and mind,

original: aom a'a: h'um gsum /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um gsum /
translated: One should meditate on the three syllables oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: bkod pa lha ru dmigs par bya //
analyzed: bkod pa lha ru dmigs par bya //
translated: One should visualize the array as the deity.

original: de nas me lha spyan drangs te //
analyzed: de nas me lha spyan drangs te //
translated: Then, having invited the fire god,

original: mchod bcas pa yis yam shing gis //
analyzed: mchod bcas pa yis yam shing gis //
translated: With the offering, by the firewood,

original: sngags pa'i dngos grub 'jig par byed //🔽yam shing dbang du byas pa yi //🔽sreg rdzas mchod @74a * //
analyzed: sngags pa'i dngos grub 'jig par byed // yam shing dbang du byas pa yi // sreg rdzas mchod @74a * //
translated: The accomplishment of the mantra will be destroyed.🔽The offering substances, which are dependent on the firewood,

original: rdzas rnam pa ni //
analyzed: rdzas rnam pa ni //
translated: Are the burnt offerings.🔽The offering substances

original: dkar gsum mngar gsum thug pa dang // 'bras chan nas chan can gyi tshogs //
analyzed: dkar gsum mngar gsum thug pa dang // 'bras chan nas chan can gyi tshogs //
translated: The collection of the three white foods, the three sweet foods, porridge,🔽rice, barley, and so forth,🔽the collection of medicines, such as ghee,

original: sman gyi tshogs ni la du dang // de sogs rdzas dang til dag ni //
analyzed: sman gyi tshogs ni la du dang // de sogs rdzas dang til dag ni //
translated: and so forth, and sesame seeds,

original: g-yas kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
translated: should be placed on the right side.🔽Incense, flowers, lamps,

original: spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri dang zhal zas mchod pa'i tshogs//
analyzed: spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri dang zhal zas mchod pa'i tshogs//
translated: perfume, and the collection of offering substances

original: g-yon gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
translated: should be placed on the left side.

original: ku sha yon chab g-yas yin te //
analyzed: ku sha yon chab g-yas yin te //
translated: The kuśa grass and the water for the feet are on the right,🔽the butter, vajra, and bell,

original: mar dang rdo rje dril bu dang // dgang gzar blugs gzar mdun du'o //
analyzed: mar dang rdo rje dril bu dang // dgang gzar blugs gzar mdun du'o //
translated: and the ladle and funnel for the oblations are in front.

original: sreg rdzas mchod rdzas rim pa'o //
analyzed: sreg rdzas mchod rdzas rim pa'o //
translated: This is the sequence of the offering substances and the oblation substances.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i bya ba ni //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i bya ba ni //
translated: The performance of the realizations:🔽Having performed the pure ablution, anointed the body,

original: dag pa'i khrus byas lus dris byug / gos dang rgyan ni bgo bya ste //
analyzed: dag pa'i khrus byas lus dris byug / gos dang rgyan ni bgo bya ste //
translated: and put on the clothes and ornaments,

original: ku sha bde ba'i stan nyid la //
analyzed: ku sha bde ba'i stan nyid la //
translated: on the kuśa grass, which is the seat of bliss,

original: shar du kha bltas 'dug byas te //
analyzed: shar du kha bltas 'dug byas te //
translated: one should sit facing east.

original: snying brtse ba yi bsam pa yis //
analyzed: snying brtse ba yi bsam pa yis //
translated: With a compassionate attitude,

original: las kyi bum pa byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: las kyi bum pa byin brlabs nas //
translated: having consecrated the activity vase,

original: rdzas rnams dag par bsang bar bya //
analyzed: rdzas rnams dag par bsang bar bya //
translated: one should purify the substances.

original: aom khadga dhrik / de nas mchod pa so so yi //
analyzed: aom khadga dhrik / de nas mchod pa so so yi //
translated: Then, having bound the individual

original: phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzlas te //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzlas te //
translated: offering mudrās and recited the mantras,

original: tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya //
analyzed: tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya //
translated: one should consecrate them properly.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: mchod yon la'o //
analyzed: mchod yon la'o //
translated: This is for the offering water.

original: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-dhūpe āḥ hūṃ.🔽This is for the incense.

original: bdug pa'i'o // aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um /
analyzed: bdug pa'i'o // aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-puṣpe āḥ hūṃ.

original: me tog la'o //
analyzed: me tog la'o //
translated: This is for the flowers.

original: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-dhūpe āḥ hūṃ.

original: mar me la'o //
analyzed: mar me la'o //
translated: This is for the lamp.

original: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-gandhe āḥ hūṃ.🔽This is for the scent.

original: dri la'o // aom badzra nee wi tye a'a: h'um /
analyzed: dri la'o // aom badzra nee wi tye a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-naividye āḥ hūṃ.

original: zhal zas la'o //
analyzed: zhal zas la'o //
translated: This is for the food.

original: aom badzra shabda a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra shabda a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-śabda āḥ hūṃ.

original: rol mo la'o //
analyzed: rol mo la'o //
translated: This is for the music.

original: de nas dngos med ngang nyid las //
analyzed: de nas dngos med ngang nyid las //
translated: Then, from the state of non-entity,

original: skye ba med la padma yi //
analyzed: skye ba med la padma yi //
translated: in the unborn lotus

original: gzhal yas khang pa chu gdan can //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang pa chu gdan can //
translated: is the immeasurable mansion with a water seat.

original: bsam pa bram ze'i khyim dang ni //
analyzed: bsam pa bram ze'i khyim dang ni //
translated: Imagining it, from the house of a brahmin

original: dge 'dun rgyun bzhag me dag las //
analyzed: dge 'dun rgyun bzhag me dag las //
translated: and the continuous placement of the saṅgha,

original: blang la me ni spar byas te //
analyzed: blang la me ni spar byas te //
translated: the fire is taken and ignited.

original: bsangs la gzi bskyed me pra brtag / de nang byang chub lnga dag las //
analyzed: bsangs la gzi bskyed me pra brtag / de nang byang chub lnga dag las //
translated: Then, from the five awakenings,

original: gyur pa'i padma'i gdan steng du //🔽gru gsum me las byung ba yi //
analyzed: gyur pa'i padma'i gdan steng du // gru gsum me las byung ba yi //
translated: upon a lotus seat that has arisen from that,🔽the fire god, white and arisen from the fire triangle,

original: me lha dkar po zhal gsum pa //
analyzed: me lha dkar po zhal gsum pa //
translated: has three faces,

original: rang gi rigs dang ldan pa'i lus /
analyzed: rang gi rigs dang ldan pa'i lus /
translated: a body endowed with his own clan,

original: g-yas na spyi blugs mi 'jigs sbyin //🔽g-yon na dbyug pa phreng ba 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yas na spyi blugs mi 'jigs sbyin // g-yon na dbyug pa phreng ba 'dzin //
translated: a water-pot and the boon of fearlessness in the right [hands],🔽and a club and a rosary in the left [hands].

original: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / g-yas brkyang ba yi phyag gis mnan //
analyzed: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / g-yas brkyang ba yi phyag gis mnan //
translated: The root hands hold a flaying knife and skull-cup, and he stands with the right leg straight.

original: khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //🔽de nas thugs kyi sa bon las //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o // de nas thugs kyi sa bon las //
translated: He is adorned with the ornaments of wrath.

original: ye shes me ni dgug par bya //
analyzed: ye shes me ni dgug par bya //
translated: Then, the wisdom fire is summoned from the seed syllable of the heart.

original: aom t'a kki h'um dza:/
analyzed: aom t'a kki h'um dza:/
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ jñāna-vahni-e hūṃ jaḥ

original: bsangs la dam tshig gzhug par bya //
analyzed: bsangs la dam tshig gzhug par bya //
translated: One should purify with smoke and induct into the pledge.

original: aom mung+ga ra dza:/
analyzed: aom mung+ga ra dza:/
translated: Oṃ muṃ jaḥ

original: aom danda h'um /
analyzed: aom danda h'um /
translated: Oṃ daṃ hūṃ

original: aom padma bam /
analyzed: aom padma bam /
translated: Oṃ padma vaṃ🔽Oṃ khaṃ hoḥ

original: aom khadga ho:/ de nas skye mched sku gsung thugs //🔽byin brlabs dbang bskur mchod pa 'bul //
analyzed: aom khadga ho:/ de nas skye mched sku gsung thugs // byin brlabs dbang bskur mchod pa 'bul //
translated: Then, the sense bases, body, speech, and mind🔽are empowered, the initiation is conferred, and offerings are presented.

original: bstod pa zhal du re pha bkod /
analyzed: bstod pa zhal du re pha bkod /
translated: One should praise and place the aspiration in the mouth.

original: sreg rdzas @74b byur bur dbul bar bya //
analyzed: sreg rdzas @74b byur bur dbul bar bya //
translated: and the sacrificial substances are offered in abundance.

original: yakshe ma me da /
analyzed: yakshe ma me da /
translated: Yaksha Ma Ma

original: yatstsha ni r'a dza sa ru /
analyzed: yatstsha ni r'a dza sa ru /
translated: Yatsha Ni Raja Saru

original: na yo ni ra /
analyzed: na yo ni ra /
translated: Nayo Ni Ri

original: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad //
translated: The vajra, wheel, jewel, lotus,🔽sword, hammer, club,

original: ral gri tho ba dbyug pa dang // padma dang ni ral gri che //
analyzed: ral gri tho ba dbyug pa dang // padma dang ni ral gri che //
translated: lotus, and great sword,

original: 'khor lo rdo rje pad ral gri //
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje pad ral gri //
translated: wheel, vajra, lotus, and sword,

original: so sor sngags kyis lhar bskyed bya //
analyzed: so sor sngags kyis lhar bskyed bya //
translated: are generated as deities with their individual mantras.

original: de nas skye mched byin brlabs te //
analyzed: de nas skye mched byin brlabs te //
translated: Then, the sense bases are consecrated:

original: mig ni sa yi snying po la //
analyzed: mig ni sa yi snying po la //
translated: The eyes are Kshitigarbha,

original: rna ba phyag na rdo rje'i tshul //
analyzed: rna ba phyag na rdo rje'i tshul //
translated: the ears are in the manner of Vajrapani,

original: sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dgod //
analyzed: sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dgod //
translated: the nose is placed as Akashagarbha,🔽the tongue is Avalokiteshvara,

original: lce la 'jig rten dbang byug bzhag / sgrib pa rnam sel lus la bshad //
analyzed: lce la 'jig rten dbang byug bzhag / sgrib pa rnam sel lus la bshad //
translated: and the body is explained as Nivaranavishkambhin.

original: yid la kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: yid la kun du bzang po'o //
translated: The mind is Samantabhadra.

original: kshim dzim gam kam sam //
analyzed: kshim dzim gam kam sam //
translated: Kshrim Jrim Krim Glim Srim

original: thugs la zhe sdang rdo rje ste //
analyzed: thugs la zhe sdang rdo rje ste //
translated: In the heart is Hatred Vajra,

original: gsungs la 'dod chags rdo rje dgod //
analyzed: gsungs la 'dod chags rdo rje dgod //
translated: in the speech is placed Desire Vajra,

original: gti mug rdo rje sku la'o //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje sku la'o //
translated: and Delusion Vajra is in the body.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Om Ah Hum

original: de nas dbang bskur dgug gzhug bya //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur dgug gzhug bya //
translated: Then, the empowerment is conferred and the summoning is performed.

original: gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod byas la //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod byas la //
translated: Having made offerings with the secret offering,

original: rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis //
translated: With the vajra and the bell,

original: gshin rje'i dgra la bstod pa bya //
analyzed: gshin rje'i dgra la bstod pa bya //
translated: one should praise Yama.

original: de nas sreg rdzas bsangs nas ni //
analyzed: de nas sreg rdzas bsangs nas ni //
translated: Then, having purified the burnt offerings,

original: bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsgrubs nas kyang //🔽bdud rtsi me lha'i zhal nyid du /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsgrubs nas kyang // bdud rtsi me lha'i zhal nyid du /
translated: and having accomplished them as the essence of nectar,🔽one should offer the burnt offerings

original: sreg rdzas rnams ni phul bar bya //
analyzed: sreg rdzas rnams ni phul bar bya //
translated: into the mouth of the fire god.

original: dkyil 'khor bzang po mnyes par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzang po mnyes par bya //
translated: One should please the excellent maṇḍala.

original: gtso bo la 'bum 'khor la khri //
analyzed: gtso bo la 'bum 'khor la khri //
translated: To the principal one, one hundred thousand; to the retinue, ten thousand;

original: de bzhin stong dang brgya rtsa brgyad //
analyzed: de bzhin stong dang brgya rtsa brgyad //
translated: similarly, one thousand, one hundred and eight,

original: lnga bcu nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun //
analyzed: lnga bcu nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun //
translated: fifty, twenty-one, and seven.

original: gtso dang 'khor gyi bye brag gis //
analyzed: gtso dang 'khor gyi bye brag gis //
translated: By the distinction of principal and retinue,

original: go rims bzhin du dbul bar bya //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer in order.

original: so so rtsa ba'i sngags dag la //
analyzed: so so rtsa ba'i sngags dag la //
translated: In each one's root mantra,

original: gsol ba gdab la dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab la dbang bskur bas //
translated: one should supplicate and confer empowerment.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi bor blta //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi bor blta //
translated: One should visualize Vajradhara on one's crown.

original: de las sa bon yi ge las //
analyzed: de las sa bon yi ge las //
translated: From that seed syllable,

original: 'phros pas yi ge nyi mar bsdu //
analyzed: 'phros pas yi ge nyi mar bsdu //
translated: the light radiates and gathers into the syllable sun.

original: de nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni //🔽zhi rgyas dbang dang drag tshul du //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni // zhi rgyas dbang dang drag tshul du //
translated: Then, the vajra recitation

original: gtor ma ldan pas bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: gtor ma ldan pas bzlas pa bya //
translated: is done with the torma in the manner of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and fierce.

original: de nas ldang bar brtsam pa ni //
analyzed: de nas ldang bar brtsam pa ni //
translated: Then, beginning to rise,

original: sems can don la sems pa yi //
analyzed: sems can don la sems pa yi //
translated: one should think of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
translated: One should request the wisdom being to depart.

original: aom a'a: h'um mu:/
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um mu:/
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ muḥ

original: yid bzhin 'khor dang rdo rje bzlas //
analyzed: yid bzhin 'khor dang rdo rje bzlas //
translated: One should recite the mantra of the wish-fulfilling wheel and vajra.

original: gtso mo khro tshul lo ma gtsigs //
analyzed: gtso mo khro tshul lo ma gtsigs //
translated: The chief one is wrathful, with a leaf held aloft,

original: phra ba'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya //
analyzed: phra ba'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya //
translated: and one should recite with a subtle manner.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: 'dis ni las kun byed pa ste //
analyzed: 'dis ni las kun byed pa ste //
translated: This accomplishes all activities

original: 'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin 'gyur //
translated: and all wishes are fulfilled.

original: yam las rlung ste ram las me //
analyzed: yam las rlung ste ram las me //
translated: From yaṃ comes wind, from raṃ comes fire,

original: kam las thod pa aa las snod //
analyzed: kam las thod pa aa las snod //
translated: from kaṃ comes a skull-cup, and from aḥ a vessel.

original: 'dab brgyad sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: 'dab brgyad sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: The eight petals are the five meats and five nectars.

original: h'um las kha dag ba aom a'a: h'um //
analyzed: h'um las kha dag ba aom a'a: h'um //
translated: From hūṃ comes a lid, and oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: bsams te me sbar zhu bas bsdu //
analyzed: bsams te me sbar zhu bas bsdu //
translated: Having visualized, the fire blazes and melts, gathering.

original: sbyangs te aom las sa 'od 'phros pas //
analyzed: sbyangs te aom las sa 'od 'phros pas //
translated: Purified, from oṃ light radiates

original: ye shes bkug la bstim byin brlab //
analyzed: ye shes bkug la bstim byin brlab //
translated: and the wisdom beings are invoked and dissolved.

original: sbu gus drangs nas gsol sbyin bya //
analyzed: sbu gus drangs nas gsol sbyin bya //
translated: One should offer the elixir drawn up through the tube.

original: lha la sogs pa'i @75a * //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i @75a * //
translated: The hosts of gods and so forth

original: tshogs bcas rnams //
analyzed: tshogs bcas rnams //
translated: are satisfied.

original: lha rdzas rdo rje yongs su dag pa'i gtor ma 'di //
analyzed: lha rdzas rdo rje yongs su dag pa'i gtor ma 'di //
translated: This torma of completely pure vajra divine substance,

original: grihna kh'a hi grihna kh'a hi ma ma sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: grihna kh'a hi grihna kh'a hi ma ma sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: graha khahi graha khahi mama shanti kuru svāhā.

original: 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug la sogs la //
analyzed: 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug la sogs la //
translated: In going, walking, lying down, sitting, and so forth,

original: dpa' bo nga rgyal btang mi bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo nga rgyal btang mi bya //
translated: the hero should not give up pride.

original: dngos po dngos bral skye dang bral //
analyzed: dngos po dngos bral skye dang bral //
translated: Free from entity and nonentity, free from arising,

original: g-yo ba g-yo med bde ba can //
analyzed: g-yo ba g-yo med bde ba can //
translated: the blissful one, moving and unmoving,

original: thabs dang shes rab las 'byed cing //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab las 'byed cing //
translated: arises from method and wisdom,🔽and is placed in the nondual three topics.

original: don gsum gnyis su med la bzhag / bdag gi sgrub thabs sbyar ba 'dis //
analyzed: don gsum gnyis su med la bzhag / bdag gi sgrub thabs sbyar ba 'dis //
translated: By this composition of my means of achievement,🔽may all migrators attain Yamāntaka.

original: 'gro kun gshin rje gshed thob shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'gro kun gshin rje gshed thob shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The means of achieving glorious Black Yamāri is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It was composed by the great Indian master Kamalarakṣita.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: It was translated by the yogi mendicant Prajñāśrījñānakīrti.
